title: CEPPAD Energetic particles & angular distribution, Key parameters - J. B.Blake  (Aerospace Corp. )

info.x_cadence_note: Counts based on variable 'Epoch' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/polar/ceppad/ceppad_k0/1996/po_k0_cep_19960226_v01.cdf. The most common cadence occurred for 100.0000% of the 19 timesteps. Cadence = 101200 [ms] = PT1M41.2S.

parameters.name: IPS_10
parameters.description: Spin averaged integral proton rate 10 deg from spin axis

parameters.name: IPS_10_errorbars
parameters.description: Spin averaged integral proton rate 10 deg from spin axis, with error bars. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['IPS_10']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: IPS_10_ERR
parameters.description: Stat. err. P 10 deg
